For anyone using Radeon cards, you must update your drivers to Catalyst 10.10. Anything below that results in severe texture issues.

Shinrad - No, the English cut-scenes haven't been taken out. The Russian cut-scenes are all in English, but because the game is looking specifically for English cut-scenes, it crashes. Just switch the language back to Russian (make sure you've got everything properly setup first - graphics, controls, etc) and you've got working, English-language cut-scenes.

Bit of a mess, this distro.

Also, anyone using Radeon cards should update their drivers to Catalyst 10.10. Using any other driver version will result in severe texture issues.

@john6425 - Perhaps your AV updated in those couple hours, and is now detecting the file as a "false positive."  Solution - set AVG to "ignore" that file.  Happy gaming to ya.

Ok this is for anyone with an ATI graphics card with dark screen dark characters. Ultimate fix >
go to catalyst control center.. be sure u have Version 10.10.. 
select  then set everything to default.
after that:
-Disable the Catalyst AI
-Enable triple buffering
should work......:)
u wont find tese settings in basic mode so change to advance
